# 7th Golden Melody Awards

| location       = Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan
| host           = Tsai ChinKenny Bee
| network        = CTS
| runtime        =
| ratings        =
| previous       = 6th
| main           = Golden Melody Awards

The 7th Golden Melody Awards ceremony () was held at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei on June 8, 1996.
